title: Crankbrothers Bernard Kerr Edition Stamp and Mallet Shoes
content:
Is purple having a moment? I’d say so. These new Bernard Kerr Edition Stamp and Mallet Shoes from Crankbrothers caught our eye this morning. Featuring a white and purple upper and a gumsole, they “pop” when brand new and will look even better with some dust and mud on them. The Stamp flat and Mallet clipless models are lace up, so no Velcro to get caught on your socks or BOA systems to bash on a rock. Simple. Check them out at Crankbrothers.
